caption:

normalizing flow (unconditional (UFLOW) and conditional (CFLOW)), number of coupling (# of CL) and pooling layers (# of PL).

caption:
Table 6. Thus, their GPU allocation for fast 
inference is infeasible. In contrast, our CFLOW-AD can 
be processed in real-time with 8? to 25? faster inference 
speed on 1080 8GB GPU with the same input resolution 
and feature extractor. In addition, MobileNetV3L encoder 
provides a good trade-off between accuracy, model size and 
inference speed for practical inspection systems.
